nodes.text: Kri'gee was a beverage sold in bottles by the Mandalorians. After Captain Patrok Ru-Saxon provided intel to Coruscant Police Inspector Tanivos Exantor Divo, Divo sent a bottle of Tarine tea. Ru-Saxon sent him a bottle of the ale in return. Rebel leader Mon Mothma once dared Airen Cracken to finish a glass of kri'gee, an experience he had not so fond memories of. Several decades later, Resistance pilot Poe Dameron read an old document where Cracken mentioned the incident to Mothma, and was surprised to learn that the two Rebels had gotten their hands on a bottle of kri'gee, adding "I was born fifty years too late."

Kri'gee first appeared in the Star Wars Legends novel The Old Republic: Revan, published in November 2011. It became canon when it was mentioned in the reference book Star Wars: The Rebel Files, published in November 2017.
